reviewText: Simply amazing!!! Awesome video shots & kid's can eatch it!! Definitely makes you wanna get out and shred the trials and rip! Loved it!!!!!

As a huge fan of Life Cycles, it's been hard for me to find another mountain bike dvd I enjoy as much. This one is simply amazing. The music, cinematography, locations, etc are all phenomenal and inspire me to get out and ride. Amazing, beautiful, fantastic. Love every thing about it. Just wish it was longer!
Great riding!  Makes one want to go out and conquer the world.

I just watched this file and as a fan of MTB, I think the way the photography was awesome, able to capture the essence and thrill of the sport with the right elements. There is really nothing I don't like about this film, all the components fit perfectly in the making of this film, and clearly an instant classic for us MTB fans.
